title: "Objective Function Estimation"
output: pdf_document
---

```{r Setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library("readxl")
data <- read_excel("Complied Data.xlsx")
```

```{r Defining variables}
netneg <- data$`Net negativity score`
inf_f_2 <- data$fccpiiq2
inf_f_2sq <- inf_f_2^2
inf_f_4 <- data$fccpiiq4
inf_f_4sq <- inf_f_4^2
gdp_f_2 <- data$fcgdpq2
gdp_f_4 <- data$fcgdpq4
ur_f_2 <- data$fcurq2
ur_f_2sq <- ur_f_2^2
ur_f_4 <- data$fcurq4
ur_f_4sq <- ur_f_4^2

phillowe <- data$`Phillip Lowe`
```

```{r Baseline regression with inflation only - 2 quarters ahead}

# Linear regression model with 2 quarter ahead inflation, and its squared term, and a fixed effects for governor

model_inf_2q <- lm(netneg ~ inf_f_2+inf_f_2sq + phillowe, data = data)
summary(model_inf_2q)

#The estimate for the inflation target, and standard error using delta method

model_inf_2q_est <- -coef(model_inf_2q)[2]/(2*coef(model_inf_2q)[3])
model_inf_2q_est

```

```{r Baseline regression with inflation only - 4 quarters ahead}

# Linear regression model with 4 quarter ahead inflation, and its squared term, and a fixed effects for governor

model_inf_4q <- lm(netneg ~ inf_f_4+inf_f_4sq + phillowe , data = data)
summary(model_inf_4q)

#The estimate for the inflation target, and standard error using delta method

model_inf_4q_est <- -coef(model_inf_4q)[2]/(2*coef(model_inf_4q)[3])
model_inf_4q_est
```

```{r Estimating both inflation target and NAIRU - 2 quarters ahead}

# Linear regression model with 2 quarter ahead inflation, and its squared term, and a fixed effects for governor

model_inf_NAIRU_2q <- lm(netneg ~ inf_f_2+inf_f_2sq + phillowe + ur_f_2+ur_f_2sq, data = data)
summary(model_inf_NAIRU_2q)

#The estimate for the inflation target, and standard error using delta method

model_inf_NAIRU_2q_est_inf <- -coef(model_inf_2q)[2]/(2*coef(model_inf_2q)[3])
model_inf_NAIRU_2q_est_inf

model_inf_NAIRU_2q_est_NAIRU <- -coef(model_inf_2q)[5]/(2*coef(model_inf_2q)[6])
model_inf_NAIRU_2q_est_NAIRU
```
